title: Constellations That Sing Of Death
alternative_title: Bintang Kematian ; Shi o Utau Seiza ; Shi wo Utau Seiza ; 死を唄う星座
status: Bintang Kematian ; Shi o Utau Seiza ; Shi wo Utau Seiza ; 死を唄う星座
description:
Description :
        This manga includes four different stories dealing with horror and supernatural stuff.  
1) Constellations that Sing of Death  
2) Mist When You Turn Around / When the Fog Comes  
3) Shiver of Flames / Fire Starter  
4) The Mansion of Time / The Castle

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4: The Mansion Of Time
